name: Monkey Mania
overview:
Monkey Mania by Coastal Amusements blends a water-racing carnival game, the jungle and a video game into one excellent package.

Featuring redemption play for 1 or 2 players, each users has a banana shaped water gun that they must use to focus the water jet into the lit targets to make the video monkey on the sharp 32″ LCD monitor paddle their boats along the jungle river towards the finish line. Like any other race, reach that finish line first to win! Monkey Mania is great fun for all ages!
